name: vsmahome
0:
”Alexa, show office.”
”Alexa, show my office camera.”
”Alexa, show feed from office.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Using this skill, you can view camera videos with your echo show or file TV. To use this skill, you need to have a vamahome cloud camera and register a vsmahome account to add your cloud camera to your vsmahome account. Next, you need to link this skill to your vsmahome account. After completing the link between this skill and vsmahome account, you can say "Alexa, discover devices" to find your devices. If you have a vsmahome camera nicknamed "office" in your device list, you can say "Alexa, show my office camera" to watch the video of the camera.
